rows.label: qst202017_0010
rows.name: Hold on, my belly's starting to rumble.

rows.label: qst202017_0020
rows.name: Oh goodness, is it that late already?

rows.label: qst202017_0030
rows.name:
Don't worry - I won't be ten minutes!
I'll make enough for everyone.

rows.label: qst202017_0040
rows.name: So, what's on the menu today?

rows.label: qst202017_0050
rows.name: I'll give you three guesses.

rows.label: qst202017_0060
rows.name:
Oh all right, I'll play along.
Could it be...dumplings?

rows.label: qst202017_0070
rows.name: Spot on!

rows.label: qst202017_0080
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]*fit of coughing*

rows.label: qst202017_0090
rows.name: You all right there, man?

rows.label: qst202017_0100
rows.name:
Yeah, don't you worry.
Just a pesky little cough.

rows.label: qst202017_0110
rows.name: She's a sweet lass, isn't she?

rows.label: qst202017_0120
rows.name: Totally. And her cooking's top notch.

rows.label: qst202017_0130
rows.name: If making of dumplings is same as cooking...

rows.label: qst202017_0140
rows.name:
She is perhaps a little misguided at times, but
her love and compassion cannot be faulted.

rows.label: qst202017_0150
rows.name: Right...

rows.label: qst202017_0160
rows.name:
My life never amounted to much, to be
honest with you.

rows.label: qst202017_0170
rows.name:
I did some reckless things in my time,
all to be the center of attention.

rows.label: qst202017_0180
rows.name:
And every time I bungled something up, Musubi
and the kids'd suffer for it somehow.

rows.label: qst202017_0190
rows.name:
But Musubi, she stuck by my side all the
same.

rows.label: qst202017_0200
rows.name:
She took the role of my dearly departed, bless her
soul, and started looking after the kids for me.

rows.label: qst202017_0210
rows.name:
She's become a part of the family now. I don't
know what we'd do without her.

rows.label: qst202017_0220
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]*large cough*

rows.label: qst202017_0230
rows.name: And that's why...

rows.label: qst202017_0240
rows.name:
I just want her to have a good life. Do you know
what I'm saying?

rows.label: qst202017_0250
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]*cough cough*

rows.label: qst202017_0260
rows.name: Are you all right?!

rows.label: qst202017_0270
rows.name: I'm fine! I just need to lie down for a bit.

rows.label: qst202017_0280
rows.name: That seems like the best course of action.

rows.label: qst202017_0290
rows.name: Let me just...close my eyes a moment...

rows.label: qst202017_0300
rows.name: M-Mabon...?
